title: Shrine
creator_credit: David Bilcock, John Dixon, Kent Chadwick, Cambridge Film Productions and Film Victoria
brief_description: The Shrine of Remembrance in Melbourne was built as a memorial to Victorians who served in the first World War, and also honours those who served in the Second World War. The film looks at the Shrine, and the feelings of pride and mateship amongst Australian soldiers who fought in both wars.
creator_credit_for_label: David Bilcock, John Dixon, Kent Chadwick, Cambridge Film Productions and Film Victoria
